channel.title: Project Da-Ocpz!
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Ocpz-Scape Development Team[/size] Hello everyone, i am david and this is my project of ocpz-Scape which is currently running on a vps 24/7 but i need a developmental team to help me with some stuff! like bugs glithches, fixinf memory leaks! Staff list Owner:David~me Co-owner:-OPEN- Coder:David~me Hoster:vps Working herblore Working shops Working pvp Working godwars Working clan wars Working barbarian assault Working barrows Lots of commands Slayer works All skills work All special attacks 100% Skillcape emotes! Working Vengeance! Working turmoil! Island Brimhaven dungeon Taverley dungeon King black dragon Pest control Barrows Tzhaar 44 portals Corp beast godwars Here are screenshots of Ocpz-Scape: some of the work i have done so far! [IMG]http://i743.photobucket.com/albums/xx79/b00dpk/ocpz-Drag-logo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i743.photobucket.com/albums/xx79/b00dpk/donorzonebenifits.png[/img] [IMG]http://i743.photobucket.com/albums/xx79/b00dpk/homepsd.png[/img] [size=18pt][center][b]-Still adding more- (to busy atm)[/b][/center] [size=24pt]Website admin[/size]:
Name: Msn: Skype: Coded HTMLs before?:yes/no About you:
[size=24pt]Coder:[/size]
Name: Msn: Skype: Coded servers: About you
: [size=24pt]Gfx Creator[/size](someone that can make good media like pictures and signatures!)
Name: Msn: Skype: post any work done by you: About you:
Thanks for reading...

item.title: Project Da-Ocpz!
item.dc:creator: @TimeBroken TimeBroken
item.description:
@TimeBroken wrote:

[quote=“bl00dpk, post:7, topic:387742”]have changed npc! there were no torms and i had added them they were glitched had fixed them.
to many glitches like level 1 theiving could steel from level 80 thieving stall had to fix that.
most npc emote and gfx and attacks were glitched had to fix those.
godwars was glitched,
slayer tower is glitched which im working on
added some teleports

btw i knoow they are kinda small things but i dont really care since its my first server (Y)
haterrs keep hatin :)[/quote]
-I’ve tested out Lost Legacy, the thief stalls aren’t glitches? Most NPC emotes are 100%.

Well, good luck on your server. Hope you can balance the responciblities of a good owner, like frequent updates, finding what the players want, fixing bugs, promoting good staff, demoting bad staff, etc.

Read full topic

to many glitches like level 1 theiving could steel from level 80 thieving stall had to fix that.
most npc emote and gfx and attacks were glitched had to fix those.
godwars was glitched,
slayer tower is glitched which im working on
added some teleports

btw i knoow they are kinda small things but i dont really care since its my first server (Y)
haterrs keep hatin and also im trying my best(Y)
